manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: System Requirements Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or later, and most video calling applications. Simply connect this HD webcam to your computer and video chat instantly with Skype, Windows Messenger or your favorite instant messaging application. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great video quality & easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The camera arrived a couple of days late, but was super easy to install. The picture quality on it is outstanding. The microphone works perfect as well. I use it for zoom meetings with my colleagues at work. The only thing I don’t like about it, is that it doesn’t have a lens cover for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broke after 2 months, but boutht it again
reviews.reviewText: The cable connected into the camera back is now loose which results in "Matrix" effect . Was good camera while working but 2 months is just way too short.Bought another one first as replacement but was disappointed w/ replacement resolution quality.So I bought this one again it has hold since for about 6 months. So this time durability is better.Bumping up the stars from 1 to 3, if it endures more than a year will bump it up again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install. I propped it up on the left side of my right monitor. Small and unobtrusive. Great picture quality. Just what I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer beware--this camera does not work!
reviews.reviewText: I am stuck with this worthless piece of equipment because of the lack of technical support offered by this company. Assuming the problem was with my computer, I kept trying to solve its lack of functionality, which took me past the 30-day return time. I boosted my ram, I called in a computer technician, and I roamed the web looking for solutions (and clearly many other people have struggled with this web camera). I am extremely disappointed by this product and would urge anyone looking at this line of webcams to go elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive little webcam
reviews.reviewText: It’s more powerful compare to built-in webcam with laptop. Image and mic sounds both are of excellent quality. The built in microphone produces excellent sound. He has no issue for the conversation even from a distance. Virtually no setting up to do, automatically hooks up to your computer and the mic is a nice touch so that I don't have to buy one separately.
